Uses of Interface
org.restlet.connector.Connector

Packages that use Connector
org.restlet.connector Mechanisms that enable communication between components. 
 

Uses of Connector in org.restlet.connector
 

Subinterfaces of Connector in org.restlet.connector
 interface Cache
          Connector used to reduce interaction latency.
 interface Client
          Connector that initiates communication by making a request.
 interface Resolver
          Connector that translates resource identifiers into network address information.
 interface Server
          Connector that listens for connections and responds to requests.
 interface Tunnel
          Connector that simply relays communication across a connection boundary.
 

Classes in org.restlet.connector that implement Connector
 class AbstractConnector
          Abstract connector implementation.
 class LocalClient
          Local client connector.
 class LocalConnector
          Local connector implementation.
